titles.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 100 Orchard Park Drive in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Keith D. Oglesby Station".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Terry moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2952.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Terry objected to the Yea - Nay vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 377 - 0 (Roll No. 30).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Thompson without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 619.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 9/27/1999--Introduced. Redesignates the U.S. Postal Service located at 100 Orchard Park Drive in Greenville, South Carolina, and known as the Orchard Park Station, as the Keith D. Oglesby Station.
